info.title: Support Manager
info.description:
The system allows customers to be able to place support requests, and support agents to process the request.

## Features

- Customers can create account.
- Customers can log in.
- Customers can create support request.
- Customers can view his/her support requests.
- Customers can comment on support request when an agent has commented.
- Agent can view all support requests.
- Agent can comment on support request.
- Agent can close a support request.
- Agent can export support requests.
- Admin can create a user account: [agent, customer, admin].
- Admin can view all support requests.
- Admin can comment on support request.
- Admin can close a support request.
- Admin can export support requests.
- Admin can delete a support requests.
- Admin can delete a user account.

## API

- BASE_URL: `http://localhost:9090/api/v1`

post.description: This lets a customer sign up to the application, the following fields are required: firstName, lastName, email, password.

Set-Cookie.default: Authorization=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoidXNlciIsIl9pZCI6IjVmMGMyYzgyYmFlM2ZmZTZjMmY4Mjk5ZiIsImxhc3ROYW1lIjoiS2VuIiwiZmlyc3ROYW1lIjoiS2VuIiwiZW1haWwiOiJLZW5AYW9sLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTU5NDYzMzM0NiwiZXhwIjoxNTk0NzE5NzQ2fQ.C37f0Utb-mkYLCfFllYDShUm_58sYMEoWOVszYWTxj8; Max-Age=900; Path=/; Expires=Mon, 13 Jul 2020 09:57:26 GMT; HttpOnly

post.description: This lets a customer login to the application, the following fields are required: email, password.

Set-Cookie.default: Authorization=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..veMowOMdhc2crbFBXe11yTZuw-oFSHSNuRJpzfB8smo; Max-Age=900; Path=/; Expires=Mon, 13 Jul 2020 10:01:13 GMT; HttpOnly

post.description: This lets an admin create a user account: 'customer', 'agent', 'admin'. The following fields are required: `firstName, lastName, email, password`, `role` is optional and could be one of `user, agent, admin` for 'customer', 'agent', 'admin' respectively.

application/json.error: You are not permitted to access this resource.

get.description: This lets an admin/agent get the list of users on the platform.
This lets an admin/agent get a given user on the platform using the user ID.

delete.description: This lets an admin delete a given user on the platform using the user ID.

post.description: This lets a user create a support requests. The following fields are required: subject, message.

get.description: This lets a user get the list of support requests, for an admin/agent it returns all support requests but returns support requests created by a customer for a customer.
This lets an user get a given support request on the platform using the ID. A customer can only view a request created by him/her.

post.description: This lets a user comment on a given support request. A customer can only comment when an admin/agent has comment and the status is not closed.

patch.description: This lets an admin/agent mark a given support request as closed.

delete.description: This lets an admin delete a given supports on the platform using the ID.

get.description:
This lets an admin/agent export support requests. Without providing any parameters, the closed requests of the past one month is exported as `csv`.
The following parameters can be passed in `query`:
 - `type` - can be csv or pdf, csv is default.
 - `status` - can be open or closed. closed default
 - `start` - date in the form `DD-MM-YYYY`, default is a month ago.
 - `end` - date in the form `DD-MM-YYYY`, default is a current date.
